utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, what’s up?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I left my guitar here again.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, okay. No problem.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here you go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Great! Umm…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So do you want to hang out or something?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe! You kinda caught me at a bad time.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh are you and Chandler…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes! Exactly.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Do you guys want me to play for you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs, what’s up?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You ask an intriguing question Chandler Bing.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! You’re getting a massage! You never let me massage you!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, I can explain!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You told me you hate massages!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Buy stamps, pick up dry cleaning…Don’t let Phoebe in.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can’t believe this! How long as this been going on?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well umm, Alexandra has been…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it has a name?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, don’t get upset!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay—Oop! Too late! I’m leaving! Come on Chandler let’s go!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, Phoebe I thought I’d——Yeah, what the hell.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh okay, okay! One more push! One more push! Come on honey, we’re almost there! We’re almost there!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Joey, I’m so happy things worked out for us that we’re having this baby together. I love you so much.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I love you too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And I hope it’s not an inappropriate time to say this but, you’re the best sex I ever had.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s always appropriate! Oh, okay. One more push! One more push!

utterance.speaker: Doctor
utterance.content: Oh, here is your beautiful baby. Congratulations!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I hope you’re a better father than you’re a friend!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey! Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come feel this! Come feel my belly!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aaaah…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey! The baby is kicking for the first time! Will you please come feel this?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, y’know what? Maybe uh, you…you should come to me. I’m a not, I’m not wearing any bottoms.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my, oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aw, it’s unbelievable! Wow! She is kicking so much! Oh, she’s like umm…oh…who’s that kind of annoying girl soccer player?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Mia Hamm?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Mia Hamm!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh that’s amazing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh-oh!! One hand on the sheet Joe!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa-hey-oh! Sorry!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey babe.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi honey. We just got a wedding gift from Bob and Faye Bing; they don’t like us do they?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who says you can’t get a nice punch bowl for under six bucks? Maybe we can take it back?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, it doesn’t say where it came from. Where would we return it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How about to the street say from the balcony?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don’t we just find a place for it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. How about in that cabinet?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! That’s where we keep the canned goods! Have you completely forgotten everything you learned at orientation?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How about the closet by the bathroom?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, okay. Here, why don’t you let me do it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no, I will do it. Honey, you have to learn to sit down and relax and let your husband take care of things once and awhile. It’s locked, you have to help me. Why is it locked?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No reason. I-I keep private things in there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh y’know, I’ve been living here a while and I’ve never seen what’s inside that closet. What is, what is in there?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Feminine stuff.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Don’t try to make me uncomfortable with feminine stuff!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, there is nothing in there that concerns you! If you love me you-you’ll let it go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Love you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hello Chandler, lovely day huh? You!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe if it helps Alexandra has only been massaging Monica for like three years. If! I said, "If it helps!"

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why won’t you let me massage you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well it’s…I mean I’d just—I’d be self-conscious. You’re my friend; I’d be naked.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica! We lived together for years! I’ve seen you naked!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s different, we were roommates! And when?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m curious about the human body.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, come on Phoebe, you can understand why this would be weird for me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But I’m a professional! And I’m really good! Look, if you’re uncomfortable we can stop. Just give me a chance, okay. Please?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, if it means that much to you…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It does! How would you feel if you couldn’t share your cooking? Or-or imagine how Ross would feel if he couldn’t teach us about dragons.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Dinosaurs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Potato, potaato.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Ross! The baby’s kicking!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! It is?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It’s not kicking right now. Although we would love to see you do that again.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, when-when was it kicking? What happened?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Last night! I just felt it and I went into Joey’s room and he was sleeping…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A dreamless sleep.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My God, the baby’s kicking. That’s great. Although I…kinda wish I-I would’ve been there to feel the kicking for the first time y’know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well I got stuff going on in here if you wanna feel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I-I don’t want to miss anymore baby stuff. So…Here. Here’s my new pager number, okay? Anytime anything pregnancy related happens use it! I’ll be there! Okay? I don’t care if it’s three in the morning and all you want is ice cream.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! Can I get a copy of that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you under the sheet?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Great, let’s begin. How’s the pressure?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nice! Wow Phoebe you are good!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Stating the obvious, but thank you. And it’s not weird is it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No. Ooohh…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s right, you just enjoy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh. Oh yeah! Ohhhhh! Ohh! Oh yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God Phoebe!! Oh that’s it! That’s it! Right there! Oh! Ooooh-oooh-ooooh…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I wasn’t trying to open your closet! I wasn’t trying to open your closet! I swear!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa, Monica runs a pretty tight ship over here. What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica has a secret closet and she won’t let me see what’s in it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t know! What could she possibly be hiding in here that I can’t see?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know. Ooh, I bet it’s Richard.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why would Monica be keeping Richard in here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well off the top of my head uhh, maybe she’s having her cake and eating it too. You being the cake and Richard being the too. Or!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And here we go…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I saw this movie once where there was a door and no one knew what was behind it, and when they finally got it open millions and millions and millions of bugs came pouring out and they feasted on human flesh. Y’know it wouldn’t kill ya to respect your wife’s privacy! Stupid closet full of bugs!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey. Joey, something feels weird and not good weird. I don’t—Whoa!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh hey whoa-whoa, don’t worry. Okay. When my sisters were pregnant they got every weird feeling in the book, it was always nothing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Absolutely. But, we’re gonna stop by the hospital just to be sure, okay? I’ll page Ross on the way. Come on.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Oh God—Ow!—Oo!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay Rach-Rach-Rach look at me, look at me, everything’s gonna be fine, trust me. Okay. Take my hand. Here we go. Oww crushing bones!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! So?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: She’s fine. She’s experiencing Braxton-Hicks contractions, mild discomfort caused by contractions in the uterine wall.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hmm, mild discomfort. So I take it you’ve had one of these Braxton thingies?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So but everything is normal.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Absolutely.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And-and there’s no danger to her and the baby?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: No-no. Contractions can be unnerving if you don’t know what they are, but she’s fine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you doctor. Oh thank you for being so nice and calm.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Calm?! I wasn’t calm! I’ve never been more scared in all my life!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But wait you said everything was gonna be okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well what do I know?! I’m not a doctor!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But I—But everything is okay. I’m fine!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You sure?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes! Yes! I got half a mind to contract that doctor’s uterus though. Mild discomfort, what’s he talking about?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh hey-hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, everything’s fine!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Your page said come to the hospital, what? What was it? What happened?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Something called Braxton-Hicks contractions.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh. Oh. Thank God, most women don’t even feel them.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, no uterus, no opinion.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey uh, what’s with the candy?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh when you beeped me I was on line at the concession stand at the movie theater.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh you went to the movies by yourself?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No I—Mona!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I gotta go back in there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Why? What’s wrong?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, everything’s fine. I just gotta go back…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No really, you tell me what’s up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I-I forgot my underwear.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, thanks so much for bringing her to the hospital.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh hey, don’t worry about it man. Don’t worry about it, no big deal.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah but still, I mean it should’ve been me. I’m the dad.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Uh, if you have any questions, here’s some information on Braxton-Hicks. Oh and by the way, you did the right thing by bringing her in. You’re gonna make a wonderful father.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh uh, hey. Not as good as this guy! He brought Twizlers!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: There has got to be a way!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Easy there Captain Kirk. Oh, do you have a bobby pin?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. Oh no wait, I’m not an nine-year-old girl.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Then why do you throw like one?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Maybe Monica has a bobby pin.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure. "Monica."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, how’s the hideously inappropriate crush on Rachel coming?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, really good. Really good. Yeah, I should be ready to kill myself any day now. Wow, you sure found that quick. I just—I wish I didn’t feel this way about Rachel anymore, y’know? I wish things could go back to normal. I mean, I love living with her and God, helping out with the baby is just amazing, but now I think…I think Ross feels left out. Y’know? When I had to take Rachel to the hospital, the doctor thought I was the father. God… You should’ve seen the look on Ross’s face. By the way, I have no idea what I’m doing here. For all I know I’m just locking it more. Oh hey, did you try opening it with a credit card?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s a good idea.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. So uh, Ross is kinda bummed huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I just…I feel terrible.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, it’s not your fault. What are you gonna do? Not take her to the hospital? Y’know? You’re doing nothing wrong. Except for harboring an all consuming love for the woman whose carrying his baby. Richard? If-if you’re in there, could you pass me my credit card?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I gotta tell you, yesterday was amazing. That massage felt so good!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No-no, I got that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So umm, what do you say we make it a weekly appointment?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Okay but you should know though, I’ve raised my rates to $200 an hour.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I mean $500.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, you make sex noises when you get massaged!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, and it really freaked me out! And after a while I even tried to hurt you and it just spurred you on.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! You’re crazy! There’s nothing sexual about the noises I make!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really? There’s nothing sexual about this? Oooh. Oo God! Ohh. Ohhhh. Ohh. What are you looking at?! I mean hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my—This is so embarrassing. Oh my God, I’m never gonna get massaged again!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, you can’t let this stop you from getting massages! No look, I have, I have lots of clients that make the same noises you do!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well not clients, lovers. But let’s just y’know, try it again. Come back and-and we’ll work through it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I guess.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Great! Okay, if you’ll just excuse me. So, did you hear something you liked?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Ross! Check it out! I learned a new trick!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey uh, I brought you some lunch.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! That’s so sweet of you! Oh yum! Did you put pickles on this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Ross!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! What?! Rach what?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I made her favorite, tuna salad with pickles.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pickle? Pickles make her sick. Giving her pickles is like giving me salad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I-I’m sorry Rach, I didn’t know. Are you gonna be okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I’ll be fine. But could someone please make sure that sandwich is gone when I get out there?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m on it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can’t believe this! I shouldn’t be the one making her throw up!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude relax! It could happen to anyone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah? Not to you, because you know this stuff. I don’t know any of it and I’m the father. I wish I’d be more involved y’know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, if anyone is keeping score, I no longer eat tuna.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey uh, can I, can I talk to you guys for a second?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, sit down. I wanna talk about our situation.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you breaking up with us?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The thing is…’cause I live with Rachel I’m here for a lot of the stuff, okay? And Ross…Ross is missing everything. So…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe you two should live together.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you asking me to move out? Do you not want me here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh no-no, no-no I love living with you. It just seems that…if you’re gonna have a roommate, y’know it might as well be the father.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But Joey, I don’t think Ross wants me to move into his apartment and disrupt his life like that. I mean——Or he does.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No I-I-I would love to be around for you and the baby. And we-we can just try it like on a temporary basis.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But Ross, its you and me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So? Sure! But it-it wouldn’t be anything romantic. And I’m-I’m dating Mona—Damnit Mona! I was supposed to meet her like an hour ago! What is wrong with me?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right now, so? What do you think?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know. Is it crazy?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No it’s not. Joey, this is a smart idea.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I was due.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, let’s do it. I’ll move in.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh Rach that’s great. That’s great.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not to shabby, I got this all off myself…using my wife’s tools. Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How did you get in there?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’re messy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no! You weren’t supposed to see this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I married Fred Sanford!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No Chandler, you don’t understand! Okay! Okay! Okay! Fine! Now you know. Okay? I’m y’know…I’m sick.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, honey you’re not sick! Look, I don’t love you because you’re organized, I love you in spite of that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really? You promise you won’t tell anyone?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! And look, now that I know if I got some extra stuff lying around can we, can we share the closet.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well…it’s just umm…I’m afraid you might mess it up.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So Rachel’s all moved out huh? How are you taking it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well uh, I wanted to have a few beers, but uh, I got rid of those because Rachel couldn’t stand the smell of them. But I have thrown back a lot of orange juice with calcium though. And uh, it’s a couple weeks past it’s expiration date, so it’s got a bit of a kick.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you kidding me? I’m great! Yeah, I’m uh; I’m better than great. I am good. And now that she’s gone, I can uh, I can do all this stuff around here that I couldn’t do before. Y’know? Like umm, I can walk around naked again. Y’know? I can uh, I can watch porn in the living room. Right? This is uh, this is good for me. Y’know? I like being on my own, I’m uh, better off this way. I’m uh, a lone wolf. Y’know? A loner. Alone. All alone. Forever. What’s a wolf got to do to get a huh around here?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohhh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s it. Just relax.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh. Oh! Ohh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on more!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you like that don’t you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh yeah right there!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You want it there? You take it there baby!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, say my name. Say it! And now I’m going to cover you back up, and umm we’re never doing this again.
